item.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

summary.text: Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 2007 to include the projects for navigation at Northeast Harbor and Tenants Harbor, Maine, among those projects that are deauthorized by such Act (currently, those projects are included among projects that are deauthorized except with respect to any portion completed before, or under construction on, the date of enactment of such Act).

bill.title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Development Act of 2007 to make technical corrections to a provision relating to project deauthorizations.

item.title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Development Act of 2007 to make technical corrections to a provision relating to project deauthorizations.
A bill to amend the Water Resources Development Act of 2007 to make technical corrections to a provision relating to project deauthorizations.

latestAction.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
